mapper.select: select M.member_email, M.nickname, M.member_phone, M.member_regdate, A.authority from member M join auth A on M.member_email = A.member_email
select M.member_email, M.nickname, M.member_phone, M.member_regdate, A.authority from member M join auth A on M.member_email = A.member_email where M.member_email like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
select M.member_email, M.nickname, M.member_phone, M.member_regdate, A.authority from member M join auth A on M.member_email = A.member_email where M.nickname like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
select M.member_email, M.nickname, M.member_phone, M.member_regdate, A.authority from member M join auth A on M.member_email = A.member_email where A.authority = #{searchKeyword}

select B.report_board_no, R.member_email, R.title as group_board_title, R.enroll_date as group_board_date from blacklist B join member M on B.member_email = M.member_email join recruit R on B.report_board_no = R.recruit_no where B.board_type='R'
